message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130 again?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make a slightly bigger concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $125?
I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $132.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not sure. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $125 again?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. This is my final offer.
I'm really sorry, but I think I'm going to have to pass on this offer. I'm going to go with John and buy the product from him for $120.
